title: Australian diary. No. 121
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: Models give insight to work at Woomera and into the work of Australia’s part in the British Commonwealth Defence Plan; a wartime Army Tank Carrier converted into a hopper barge dredges Coralline from the bed of Moreton Bay and transports it up the Brisbane River to a cement manufacturing company; a new Cub pack forms in Canberra.
